summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the SR-519 project; granting the Washington State Department of Transportation permission to use, for remote ferry operations, the eastern portion of Alaskan Way South right-of-way between South Royal Brougham Way and a point just north of South Dearborn Street, for a thirty (30) year term, specifying the conditions under which this permit is granted; and, providing for acceptance of the permit and conditions.
note: Remote Ferry Operations Area; Coleman Dock Ferry Queuing
